channel.title: Need help with Death in pvp area. (image!)
channel.description:
The player does not spawn anywhere. The player just stays at the spot of death. can some one please help me with this!.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/97/deathhelp.png/][IMG]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/5581/deathhelp.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: Need help with Death in pvp area. (image!)
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Create a void that teleports him back to a place (with his items) if he dies within those specific coordinates. If you just put the public void for death, he will loose his items. You can also create an if statement within the public void for death to identify your dieing in a safe place causing you to not lose items, but it might just create complications. I hope that made sense

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Death in pvp area. (image!)
